Madness.DESCRIPTION: Una carta al azar de tu mano cuesta 0 por el resto del combate. NL Agota.

Expertise.NAME: Experiencia
Expertise.DESCRIPTION: Roba cartas hasta que tengas !M! en tu mano.

Void.NAME: Void
Void.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When this card is drawn, lose 1 Energy. NL Ethereal.

AscendersBane.NAME: Ascender’s Bane
AscendersBane.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Cannot be removed from your deck.

Ghostly.NAME: Ghostly
Ghostly.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Intangible. NL Exhaust. NL Ethereal.

Wraith Form v2.NAME: Wraith Form
Wraith Form v2.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Intangible. NL At the end of your turn, lose 1 Dexterity.
